Special Powers
GREAT CAPTAIN: Leadership. When Cyclops uses it and succeeds, this turn, friendly characters that have X-Men team ability may use it as FREE.

July 1, 2022
Coyote's Own
Rule question belong in the rule forum because the text I'm jutys going to write will hard to comprehend in unit's section comments "X-MEN - POWER: Choose an adjacent friendly character that can use this team ability and heal that character 1 click and roll a d6. [1 -4]: This character is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.,." (Rule Forum) "FREE actions follow these rules: - Can be activated regardless of the number of action tokens the character has. - Can normally only be activated during the Action phase when nothing is resolving unless an effect specifies it may be activated during a different phase. - Can be activated even if the character was already given a costed action this turn. - Can be activated even if the number of costed actions you’ve already given this turn is equal to your action total. - CAN’T activate the same effect more than once per turn" (Comprehensive rulebook p.16) If Cyclops succeded his Leadership character who can use the X-men TA can use it as a costed POWER and can use it once as FREE. They can't use it multiple times for free. And now this whole text will be squeezed into a single block in the units section, which is why rules questions should be asked in the rule forum. Edit: If you post the dial in the rules thread a link to that thread will appear in the units section under the character dial.
